title: Bug 2529: Navigator - Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529: Navigator - Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2 in the Navigator, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should either be available or neither should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Navigate to the Navigator.
2. Select both P1 and P2.
3. Check the availability of the Open Project and Close Project menu items.
